__e: My only hope is to find someone with something and make them like me.
Your only hope is to tell me so I can hopefully one day share your struggle with the world.
Best hope is to get him talking, but that could be tough.
Babe, my only hope is for us to be happy, healthy, and in love forever.
Your only hope is to tell me so I can hopefully one day share your struggle with the world.
Best hope is to get him talking, but that could be tough.
You said I was the best prospect you'd ever seen.
I certainly hope that you won't let me, and the world, down.

I don't know, some fantasy where you and I could be together.

But it's our last, best hope for peace.
It can be a dangerous place.
Your belief in your mission is the sole hope for mankind.
